title: Drawing, "Design for a cover for The New Yorker", ca. 1940
medium: Graphite, brush and tempera, Chinese white on paper
description: Deep blue background with blue corner lamp light and ray of bright yellow light against which is silhouetted a black cat being let out. The head and right arm of its mistress seen holding the door open.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a cover for The New Yorker", ca. 1940.
ca. 1940. Graphite, brush and tempera, Chinese white on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-4.
